title: Patch Notes
content: Restoration. Updated Elemental Weapon to allow all damage types at all spell levels and include upcast benefits at Levels 5 and 6. Examining in-world surfaces with the 'Pin Tooltip' keybind now correctly displays the tooltip. Fixed a bug causing keyboard input to block if you spam the Level Up button and the Esc key.
